full_summary:
================================================================================

**Portable Raman Detector**
================================

**Reference Number:** WS4075352041-Doc4102209202
**Solicitation Number:** WS4075352041

**Publication Date:** July 17, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 2, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
**Expected Contract Start Date:** August 17, 2023

**Description of Goods or Services**
--------------------------------

The Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services, is seeking one (1) Raman hand-held portable detection system for identification of hazardous and toxic materials in water and granular samples.

**Requirements**
--------------

* The detection system must be delivered to Ottawa, ON by March 28, 2024.
* Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.

**Notice of Amendment**
----------------------

Please disregard the original closing time posted on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by August 2, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Notice of Canadian Trade Agreements**
--------------------------------------

This tender is subject to the following Canadian trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Note of Contract Type**
-------------------------

This tender falls under the "Competitive - Open Bidding" contract category. The selection criteria for this tender is the "Lowest Price".
